Title.evidence: In this multicenter, double-blinded randomized controlled trial

Trial_Design.evidence: In this multicenter, double-blinded randomized controlled trial

Participants.evidence: adults undergoing major cardiac, thoracic, or abdominal surgery

Intervention.evidence: randomized to receive either gabapentin (600 mg before surgery, 300 mg twice daily for 2 days after surgery) or placebo

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was length of hospital stay.

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 1,196 participants were randomized

Number_Analysed.evidence: 596 were allocated to placebo, and 600 were allocated to gabapentin

Harms.evidence: 384 participants experienced one or more serious adverse events
